Tasks.Task: Create a virtual network and virtual network gateway
Tasks.Task Description: Create a virtual network and virtual network gateway if you haven't already. This is a prerequisite for setting up ExpressRoute.

Tasks.Task: Set up the connection between the virtual network gateway and ExpressRoute circuit
Tasks.Task Description: Use a Terraform script or PowerShell command to configure the connection between the virtual network gateway and your ExpressRoute circuit.
Verify your configuration by selecting 'Get ARP Records' and 'Get route table' under the ExpressRoute Private peering page in the Azure portal.
Enable ExpressRoute Fast Path to access your Azure Large Instances servers from anywhere, including Azure VMs and on-premises.
Create and modify an ExpressRoute circuit to establish a private connection to Microsoft cloud services.
Set up and modify the peering configuration for your ExpressRoute circuit to define how traffic is routed.

Tasks.Task: Link a VNet to an ExpressRoute circuit
Tasks.Task Description: Link a virtual network (VNet) to an ExpressRoute circuit to enable private connectivity between your on-premises network and Azure.

Tasks.Task: Customize metrics and create a Connection Monitor
Tasks.Task Description: Customize your ExpressRoute metrics and set up a Connection Monitor to track the performance and reliability of your connection.
Evaluate the network design to ensure connectivity between all resources, considering mechanisms like Azure ExpressRoute, public Internet, or private endpoints.
Assess the network security requirements for your Azure Synapse implementation, including the use of Azure ExpressRoute, firewalls, and private endpoints.

Tasks.Task: Set up a direct interconnection between Azure and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Tasks.Task Description: Configure a direct interconnection between Azure and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure using ExpressRoute.

Tasks.Task: Use ExpressRoute for routing traffic to Microsoft PSTN services
Tasks.Task Description: Set up ExpressRoute to route traffic to Microsoft PSTN services, ensuring private and reliable connectivity.
Familiarize yourself with the technical aspects of ExpressRoute to understand its capabilities and how it can be integrated into your network.
